item.title: Raku 中的特性(二)
item.description: Set my $keywords = set <if for unless while>; # create a set sub has-keyword(*@words) { for @words -> $word { return True if $word (elem) $keywords; # 依次检查数组中的元素是否属于集合 $keywords } False; } say has-keyword 'not', 'one', 'here'; # False say has-keyword 'but', 'here', 'for'; # True Series Operator my @a=<A G C T>; my $x=@a; for 1 .
